name: Sherlock Golm's
description:
The Web GL version has been updated post jam. The version submitted at the end of the jam is the downloadable one.

Help the golems to find the exit! Each level will provide you with a new challenge to beat. All you have to do each time is to prepare your golem for their journey. They can move at the same time or not but they have a limited number of actions for each level so be wise!

Tutorial:

Drag and drop actions onto your Timeline bar and then let the events play out! 

One or both of the golems will play out your action depending on the color of the action card.

You can learn the effects of the different tiles by hovering them.

Sound Designer - Ønym Game Programmer - André Lauzier /Ønym 3D - Julien Carrel Level Design - Eden Guedj / Tristan Chardat Game Design - Tristan Chardat / André Lauzier / Eden Guedj / Ønym / Julien Carrel
